Bellow you can download packages for your favorite distro or download the source code to compile and install Takeoff in any distro. Please, consider [http://goo.gl/lTuZX make a donation] to support the project

<br/>
<hr>
<br/>


 * *Chakra:* Install Takeoff from the official repository
  $ sudo pacman -S kdeplasma-addons-applets-takeoff


 * *Ubuntu:* Add this PPA (thanks to Ferramosca Roberto)
  $ sudo apt-add-repository ppa:ferramroberto/nattyextra <br/>
  $ sudo apt-get update <br/>
  $ sudo apt-get install takeoff


 * *!OpenSuse:* Download and install this packages (thanks to Caig)
  - http://software.opensuse.org/search?q=plasmoid-takeoff&baseproject=ALL&lang=en&include_home=true&exclude_debug=true

 * *Fedora 15:* Download and install this packages (thanks to Faster)
  - https://build.opensuse.org/package/show?package=takeoff&project=home%3AFaster3ck%3Afasterindesign

 * *Arch Linux:* Available in AUR (thanks to Unikum)
  - http://aur.archlinux.org/packages.php?ID=51137
